# Budget Request: New Development Tools

## Summary
We need to purchase new development tools for the team. The current tools are outdated and causing problems. Many developers have complained about the situation.

## Problem
Our development tools are old. Developers are frustrated. We need better tools to work more efficiently. Other companies have better tools than us.

## Solution
Buy new development tools including:
- Better IDE licenses
- New laptops
- Cloud development environments
- Various productivity tools

These tools will make developers happier and more productive.

## Benefits
- Developers will be happier
- Work will go faster
- We'll be more competitive
- Better code quality

## Timeline
We should do this as soon as possible, ideally within the next few months.

## Budget
- IDE licenses: Some amount
- Laptops: ~$50K
- Cloud tools: TBD
- Other: Various

Total: Approximately $100-150K

## Conclusion
Please approve this budget request so we can improve our development capabilities and keep up with competitors.
